attributes.action: Boothtown and Claremount Road Safety - WE NEED SPEED CAMERAS
attributes.additional_details:
PLEASE SIGN AND PASS THIS PETITION AROUND -

This petition is for the community to get together and sign to state they are backing us to get speed cameras and 20mph in boothtown and claremount.

Notes from facebook page -

Over the last 6 years I have been the backbone of a campaign to implement traffic calming measures, speed restrictions, 20mph zones outside schools and nurseries and speed cameras.

It has been a constant battle with the local councils due to '' statistics '' and '' budgets '' but I will not be defeated.

 At the moment '' boothtown road '' is what I and and many others call a rat run, It's the only A road that leads from Halifax to Bradford, its a long wide road with the appeal to some people to race, speed, dangerous drive. This resulting is fatalities. I want these accidents, fatalities to stop and my campaign is to PREVENT anything happening in the future.

rejection.details: The A647 is a local authority road, and decisions about the issues for which you are campaigning rest with the relevant authorities.
